title: Why do I receive error message "can't pause [app name]" when trying to pause apps?
content:
When pausing any given app, I receive error message "can't pause [insert app name here], then the app will go into pause mode.  Also, at times I'll have to hit the pause button up to 10 times before the app will pause.  

I don't ever have the app I'm trying to pause open, nor do I have my system overloaded with open apps or processes, and it doesn't matter if I'm in regular boot or safe mode.

Any idea why this is?
